reviews.text: Go here to watch all sports great bar fabulous staff didn't have anything to eat but the food is great have had food here before especially bbq
reviews.title: Great sports bar

reviews.text: My friend and I went to try a new menu hear after a days shopping. I must say the food was absolutely lovely it was hot when it arrived at our table however we arrived and gave our order within 10 minuets of arriving and we waited and waited and waited. There was no other customers waiting for food or drinks there was no explanation as to why we were waiting however we caught the eye of the waiter and he went to find out. We were waiting due to the equipment breaking down but no one told us. We waited nearly one hour and although any machine can break down it was poor service not to tell you why you are waiting so long. I realise I am in Egypt but the waiter spoke acceptable English. That was the only complaint they need to get their act together before more customers come. It looks like they are also having some new furniture there. In the near future they will serve a take away service. The surroundings are warm and relaxing and the staff are smiling and friendly. Yes I will go back with friends but I hope they take on board that they need good communication between customers and all staff. Good luck to you in the future.
reviews.title: Jive Bar Nabq

reviews.text: Jive1 is fabulous relaxing and if your a footie fan this is the place to be. Just been recently refurbished to a very high standard and such a great place to eat and drink. Pool table upstairs and music also bbq nights give it a try !!!!!

reviews.text:
We’ve been working in Sharm since October so have visited the Union Jack many times - first time being for New Year and what a fantastic night that was, which lead to this becoming our regular for bingo, quiz night and our favourite being ‘Pie Night Wednesday!’

The staff, food and drinks were amazing! Penny and John are the most loveliest people you could wish to meet and nothing was ever too much for them. 

Going to miss our weekly visits- but we’ll definitely be back in Sharm! 

Thanks for everything and see you again in the future! 

HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
reviews.title: Absolutely AMAZING!

reviews.text:
Came here a couple of times to watch the football matches. I was staying across the road at the Rixos so very convenient, warm welcome and very good prices for drinks and food. Spent most of my time talking to the locals and hearing their stories about why they have relocated to Egypt, cost of living was the main reason as it’s very cheap compared to GB to live there.
Went on a Sunday lunchtime and saw the brilliant food, approx £6 for a full roast dinner, ‘what’s not to like’.

reviews.text: Visited with my partner and 2 children. The place is tired and in need a major makeover. It was extremely hot inside with no air conditioning apart from a huge fan blowing hot air around the room. Outside was no cooler either. Ordered 4 burgers and waited an eternity for them to be cooked. All tasted awful and we only really ate the chips. The wine was quite nice and the owners were pleasant hence the rating of 2 instead of 1. Cost us almost £50 in total which was unbelievable. I knew we should have gone to the Hard Rock Cafe!
reviews.title: Food not great

reviews.text:
We went to the bar to watch the England Women's final v's Germany in July, and we were no disappointed. We were sat quickly by the owner and his team, they even moved the table in front of the TV for us so we could get a better view.
We had a mixture of kids meals, roast dinners & pizza's all of which were cooked perfectly and tasted great. The local bottle beer is nice, just what you need in the heat. The bill at the end was surprising, not as much as we though it would be which is always a good thing. The owners are friendly and had a chat with us whilst we were there. All in all a must visit if you are in Sharm especially if you are missing a few home comforts like a full english breakfast.

reviews.text:
My friend and I stayed at Sultan Gardens Resort and our first dinner at Zaytouna Restaurant was by far the most memorable! 

Motawea and Ali were our waiters and kept us well taken care of and laughing all night. 
It was our first night out in Egypt so we had a number of questions about the menu, drinks, etc. Motawea and Ali answered all of our questions with smiles on their faces and good humor in place throughout the entire dinner. 

I was intrigued by one of the Mezze “dips” and asked Motawea about the ingredients. To our delight, him and Ali brought the chef over to discuss in detail. As the restaurant was closing and my friend and I were the last ones there, Motawea sat with us and wrote down all the ingredients/recipe for me so that I could make the Mezze on my own. 

It’s rare to leave a dinner feeling equally full as well as entertained so we’re very appreciative for Motawea, Ali and the rest of the staff for such an enjoyable dinner our first night in Egypt!
reviews.title: Perfect Restaurant in Sharm el Sheikh!

There's no real beach but there is a jetty with thousands of fish and coral around.

We discovered this place because the company i was diving suggested it as a dive-site. We then went there a further 3 times after the dive.

Its a good spot

reviews.text: We have been visiting Fanar Hotel since three years. We have visited this hotel with other friends with families. We had children with us who are 2, 3, 8, 11, 13 years old. We all had wonderful time. So it is fun to be there at any age. The sea is excellent, and beaches are very clean. The rooms are superb and very comfortable and very very clean. The food  and restaurants are also great. There are a lot of different options. There is music and joy everywhere.
reviews.title: Wonderfull hotel, excellent service and a holiday like a dream

reviews.text:
El Fanar is about 15 minutes south of Na’ama Bay by taxi. 

It was my favorite little day resort. The higher entry price is worth It. The music is chill. The lounge chairs are set up in a very good manner, with a certain amount space and shade. The clientele was attractive, more international, and respectful. The vibe was great. 

The coral reef is excellent to snorkel, just in front of the resort. There is a small jetty to use for an entry point. 

The staff was friendly and they offer waiter service at your little sunning spot. The drinks and food are on the more expensive side. The drinks were cold and I did not try the food. 

El Fanar was my favorite place to hang out in Sharm, during one week stay. It is very different then the bay and simply excellent. 

Well done and so enjoyed. 

Arrive early - 11:30 am for a better spot.
reviews.title: A great place to hang out!

reviews.text: The food and service is okay but this place is way overpriced (hint: tricks). You may be charged for every item (salad, bread). Be aware of the price of everything when you order. The waiter tried to push us to buy expensive fish from the display when we just wanted a fish tagine. We tried this place once and once was enough. Just be on alert if you don’t want sticker shock.
reviews.title: Overpriced

reviews.text: The title says it all! For tourists who want to experience more of the local way, it’s good to know that on top of the à la carte restaurant, Fares has a smaller take-away shop nearby, which is obviously much cheaper and you can actually choose the fish you want them to prepare for you. Then you come back in 1 hour and your meal is ready and packed. They usually also have some fish soup that is ready right away. Was an awesome experience for me!
reviews.title: The best seafood restaurant in Sharm El Sheikh

reviews.text:
We have been told that this is the best seafood restaurant here but I definitely don't agree. In my homeland Armenia with no sea, I have tried tastier recipes. 

We tried a soup with mixed seafood, seems like it has been cooked with milk, not tasty at all. Then we tried a plate with mixed seafood, fried calamari, mytilidae, shrimp, rice. I was expecting a better experience.
reviews.title: Not tasty

reviews.text:
Nice fresh seafood . You can pick your own seafood from the front of the restaurant and gave it cooked and delivered straight to your table. 
Be aware that you will be charged for the bread, salad, dips and bottles of water they bring to your table. So refuse if you don’t want this additional charge. But I must say the bread and dips are tasty. 

The waiter we had was very helpful at explaining the menu and prices. He also helped us unshell our prawns

Between two of us we spent just under £90 which we had prawns, lobster. Mussels, calamari, fish and chips and 2/3 soft drinks 

We had no problem is paying this amount as the food was 10/10

It also helps if you have Google translator on your phone as the bill is in Arabic and you can see exactly what you get charged for without hidden costs
reviews.title: Lovely seafood restaurant

reviews.text:
We visited Fares 6 years ago and it was Amazing. 

We were a little apprehensive about going back because I did see some poor reviews and we did not want to be disappointed. 

We were definitely not disappointed. Service was excellent and unpeeled the King Prawns for us with great expertise. 

The food was excellent and specifically the Seabass was as good as last time.

It waa a little more expensive than previous bur still great value for a great meal and experience. 

Thanks to Muhammad for your service.
reviews.title: Still five star

Food was fresh and really delicious compared to beach restaurants.  All Staffs  are friendly and owner is also friendly and came to me to say "Hello" and for small talk in German.
Food prices are also fair and low compared to beach restaurants.
we got also salad, tea and one sweet dish free.
reviews.title: Best Seafood Restaurant in Sharm El Sheikh

reviews.text: Good seafood restaurant focused mostly on shrimps, crabs and fish, but also serving nice quality beef. Shrimps are juicy, recommend grilled. Grilled steak is not really steak but served as shashlik (cut on small pieces). Mahony soup is quite nice and rich. Mr.Jasser (the restaurant owner) is very hospitable.
reviews.title: Nice and tasty

reviews.text: I’ve been here a good few times… great service and seafood meal to die for… Mohammed the owner always makes you welcome excellent staff with food to match in a very well run restaurant highly recommend
reviews.title: Fabulous seafood restaurant!!!

reviews.text:
The food is great and the prices are good.
Service was excellent just wished they kept the door shut as it let all the mossies in.

Make sure you give this place a visit.
reviews.title: excellent food !

reviews.text: Head waiter very helpful and really looked after us. Excellent food and reasonably priced steaks, don't forget to get any drinks to take with you
reviews.title: Worth a Visit

reviews.text: Amazing place with tasty food , we loved it and will come again of course , staff very frinedly and helpful
reviews.title: Onions

reviews.text: The staff was very helpful and polite. The food was excellent we ordered chicken curry and fusili with chicken pesto, both had a really god taste. Only thing that makes this a 4* is that we ordered chilli cheese fries, these came without any chilli flavor and the fries was swimming in cheese. But I absolutely recommend this place!
reviews.title: Overall a very good place

reviews.text: We’re on vacation in Sharm and were really struggling to find a good place to eat over here as we don’t prefer to stay in the hotel for meals. Onions was our best discovery, delicious food and excellent service, food was prepared really quickly. Will definitely pass by it again.
reviews.title: Great food and excellent service!

reviews.text: Had a nice meal here the menu is huge they have everything you can think of we had mozzarella and chicken sticks then I had chicken cordon bleu and my partner had steak both meals were delicious.
reviews.title: Nice food

reviews.text: Amazing restaurant, has excellent menu full of great variety, very well done with best quality of service and awesome hospitality.
reviews.title: Outstanding in Sharm El-sheikh

reviews.text:
We chose onions because it looked latex back. Service was very good. They serve drinks and have a larger menu than expected. It was nice they took credit cards as this isn’t the norm in Egypt.
Be aware the restrooms are not in the restaurant but a couple minute walk in the complex.
reviews.title: Good food

reviews.text: This restaurant is situated in the il mercato complex. The staff are friendly. There is no alcohol served. The food is spicy but not to hot and the kebabs are lovely though can be a tad dry. The prices are competitive. You can get pastas and pizzas as well as meat chicken and kebabs
reviews.title: Relaxed atmosphere

location.address: Hadaba Il Mercato, Hadaba, Sharm El Sheikh 41669 Egypt

name: Grill House Il Mercato
rankingString: #52 of 355 places to eat in Sharm El Sheikh

reviews.text:
The food here is definitely top notch. Go in the evening and eat outside.

If you have young kids then outside the restaurant they have bouncy castles and activities for young children. Maybe an evening of fun activities then food a good option.
reviews.title: Lovely food

reviews.text: I have to start by saying, I can't understand why the grill house has not even made it to the top 10. I'm shocked, as I have been there 4 times with my children, and every single time the food was amazing. Freshly cooked food, lovely outdoor space on the roof, staff are all very polite, I gave a tip to one waiter whose name I just cannot remember but I hope he sees this review as not only was he happy, smiling, and cheerful each time I saw him, he was patient. He deserves a huge tip for his service to me and my family. I ordered the BBT more than twice, it's a double chicken burger, and I had chips, onion rings, and nuggets. All the food here was cooked perfect, it was amazing and I highly recommend the grill to anyone coming to sharm el sheikh. Once you have been here, your keep coming back. And you won't be disappointed. You should be in the top 10. Thank you so much for the great service and amazing food.
reviews.title: Best grill house/restaurant/diner in sharm

reviews.text:
Lovely meal, so good we went back again!!
The size of the portions was great and the quality of food was amazing, we were comfortably full when we left
reviews.title: Absolutely amazing

reviews.text:
We went here & it was quiet. I had a starter & main course, huge portions & I just couldn’t finish them.
Great value to.
Service good
reviews.title: Wooh, great food

reviews.text: I stayed at a hotel across the road where the food was absolutely disgusting. I ate here 3 times in the week and thoroughly enjoyed it every time. Freshly cooked and amazing value for money. Service very friendly and very clean surroundings. Thank you
reviews.title: Excellent value and delicious

reviews.text:
If you like burgers this place us excellent. They also offer a good range of other options and worth a visit. 
Usually very busy.
reviews.title: Good eatery

reviews.text:
Grill house is an amazing restaurant, the food is fresh and delicious and very generous portions, 
The staff are very friendly and it is spotless, 
Really nicely decorated 
5 star from us
reviews.title: Amazing restaurant

reviews.text: Great food.  Seen some reviews about the wait for food,  we went 3 times in the 2 weeks we stayed and never experienced any long wait.  The portions are really good,  had the sharing platter,  which I'm guessing is a started,  we were stuffed after it and I had a steak as I didn't expect to be full after my starter 😂.  Prices are not too bad either.  To say me and my wife were full after the starter that cost around £9 I'm not complaining at all.  Cheaper than mcdonalds over the road.  I have read that there is no beer,  I asked for one and did wait a while for it to arrive,  I'm going to guess someone went to the shop down the road for one 🤔,  either way I got a Stella and it was cold.  Overall nice place to eat,  good food,  good prices.
reviews.title: Would visit again

reviews.text:
I ordered a delivery from Grill House Nabq branch and the bun was burned and over toasted.
It was so difficult to take a bite since it’s so hard.
When I called the restaurant the lady asked me to send a picture on their number, I did but nothing happened!
The owner responded to my review on Google and offered a free meal or full refund which is kind, however I guess I shouldn’t be the one to get in touch with them.
They have my number and as a basic courtesy procedures they should be the one taking the initiative, and get in touch with me to offer a compensation.
This is just an example of customer service people get within Egypt in general and in sharm Elsheikh specifically!!
reviews.title: The bun was burned

reviews.title: Great food

reviews.text: This restaurant was a very positive surprise. Looks very simple but it is very clean and you find Pizza and dishes that definitely meet the Italian level. The grilled seafood plate was very fresh fish, perfectly grilled and the squid was extremely good fried but also grilled. Very helpful and friendly service made the dinner "perfetto"
reviews.title: Great Italian restaurant

Not professional restaurant

reviews.title: Marco the best chef un Sharm el sheilkkkkkk

reviews.text:
The service was terrible.  The attitude of the waiter was awful.  When asked why things were taking so long I was told "we are busy"!  No apologies given, just simple rudeness.  

I understand that it was busy but the attitude of this man was unacceptable.  If he continues with this attitude, people will stop going.  The normal waiter was not there today, this guy was new to me.
reviews.title: Bad mannered staff member

reviews.text: They don’t pick up the phone on Thursday at 7:30pm. So we thought they are closed. We came by to check and saw them working. They were lots of people (true) but when we asked why you guys didn’t pick up - the answer was straight “busy”. No regret, no friendly explanation, no excuse, not really willing us to come back obviously. I’d say - not a good way of making business here. We don’t like this attitude.
reviews.title: Not friendly attitude

locations.name: Reef Beach Restaurant Managed by Egyptian Vacation Club

reviews.text: I know it sounds crazy to go to Egypt and eat at an Italian restaurant 3 or 4 times. The location, the food, and the service was unbeatable. Our waiter Shady is one of the most dearest men I have ever met. My family and I looked forward to seeing him in the evening. The location is beautiful and peaceful and a really nice getaway from the chaos of the resort and..... the food is soooo good. We were very lucky to find this spot.
reviews.title: Yes we did

reviews.text: I've have frequently visited this place. It's convenient because I live close by. It's hit or miss never consistent which is frustrating because you never know what to expect. Today was a bad experience. I usually try to keep it as simple as possible however I ordered fish with a lemon butter sauce how could it possibly go wrong. The fish and veg finally arrived after God knows how long and of course without the sauce. And of course no waiter in sight for ages, then when I finally get the waiter Saeed he then gives me a cry me a river story that never seemed to end about why there was no sauce. By this time the food is cold. I've waited table's and worked in plenty of service oriented jobs, and learnt to just be honest and admitt that you messed up. This is much appreciated and acceptable. Thank you kindly.
reviews.title: Disappointed.

reviews.text: It is a very nice Italian restaurant with a very nice atmosphere and good food. Very close to El Fanara street where our hotel is located. Run by Italian family and 100 % full even during the week which tells. Excellent Egyptian red wine served to Italian cuisine completed the dinner. Perfect service.
reviews.title: Lovely Italian Restaurant.

this my 2nd review for reef beach bcs when i go to sharm i go reef beach why?

thank for the bar staff

see u n Christmas new year

reviews.text:
The food was ok, but the general atmosphere was not good. The owner was impolite and did not understand the simple principle of respect, neither the way he spoke nor his body language. He literally treated foreign guests like an obedient puppy and treated Egyptian guests like vulgar savage ... What's worst thing is that there was no reason for him to be aggressive and tough While the rest of the young staff were very kind and polite
 Because of his lack of respect, I did not believe that he was the owner of the restaurant until I asked more than one of the employees to be sure .
reviews.title: Unfortunately a very bad experience with the owner of the restaurant

reviews.text: Usually I like to try only local food...but i want to find out how good can be an italian place  in Egypt...I was lucky...I want really indulge so i went for gnocchi marinara and was a delight...I feel In Italy!!! The steak in pepper sauce was perfect...As a chef I respect anyone who can make proper italian food outside Italy..easy in London where you can find any ingredients but its harder in Egypt!!! I love it !! The service was casual but I could have been at the Savoy  if i have to compare it!!! Just make it special....iu very ncluding the price make it a place i will come back for sure next time in Sharm...Grazie to the chef and all for the care and attention...
reviews.title: An Italian treat...A great surprise to find proper Italian food in a quite relax place...A must!!

reviews.text:
We had a fabulous meal here which was an unforgettable experience. This is genuinely a family run business and the owner,  Mohamed served us personally. Every dish was delicious and the portions were exceedingly generous. Most people dining here were locals and the food tasted authentically Egyptian and  was a feast for the eyes. 
Mohamed clearly takes  great pride in his business and this definitely shows. 
I highly recommend this place for a delicious evening meal, great service and exceedingly good value for money. What is not to love!!
reviews.title: Excellent Egyptian dining experience

reviews.text: The location of Fisherman is not the best as located beside Old market area, but if you enter restaurant you will find very warm atmosphere and nice people. Al;l evening was just perfect-service was fast, food as home made (very delicious and fish was really fresh "not frozen") and prices reasonable. Alcohol is available.  Beautiful white wine for 120 LE per bottle.

We had Farfalle al Salmone and Spaghetti with garlic prawns and chilli. Both were delicious. Followed by a dessert of chocolate mousse, very rich and also delicious. reviews.text: What a lovely place! To be honest I didn’t expect such a wonderful dining experience. To start from the beginning: nice quiet atmosphere (not banging music like in many cafes here), the staff keep distance and do not try to be over friendly with the customers. The drinks are served very quickly (mango juice and fresh lemon with mint must be tried). The food menu offers you big variety of starters, main courses and lots of sandwiches (even if you are not hungry you will definitely eat something). Special thanks to Chef (even I didn’t see him) but the pasta bolognese...mmmm.. to die for. The burger (soooooo big) and served with lots of fries and veggies. To sum up - I was not able to finish my meal as the portions are too big. It should be noted that the prices are very reasonable. Furthermore the shisha they serve not like everywhere in Sharm, they offer special coil (cocoa coil) that makes the process of smoking is enjoyable. I will definitely recommend this outlet. Well done AlHambra team!
reviews.title: Place to be visited👌🏻

reviews.text:
I love to discover different cafes and restaurants everywhere I go. This time I’ve visited Alhambra at Nabq. Very cosy and nice cafe. I personally don’t like crowds and people yelling around so it was perfect for me and my friends. There are enough tables outside, so you can enjoy your food or drinks breathing fresh air. The food is good, tasty and filling. The portions are quite big as for me. I ordered tuna salad and grilled shrimps with veggies. Tuna salad was more than enough for me :) . I loooove their lemonade or lemon fresh . Really good. 
The staff is hospitable and polite. I also liked the fact that they play various music and not only Arabic or Russian hits. A little bit of everything is a perfect mix for me 👍. 
I can totally recommend this nice place to everyone
reviews.title: Very lovely place

reviews.text: We came for a first time .its a good location .very polit staff and good training .and we recommend to come again .
reviews.title: Fantastic service

reviews.text:
My first impression of this Restaurant wasn't that bad. It looks actually good and the architecture and this agypt style are nice. So if you are looking for a good looking place, it's the right Restaurant for you to go. However you want to drink and eat something good in a friendly atmosphere, this isn't the right place for you to go. The Service was unfriendly and we had to wait more than an hour for our food. They weren't even sorry for this and instead of apologizing, they reacted unfriendly and let us feel like we were guilty ones. The food we finally received was overcooked and after complaining they didn't even brought us an other portion or minimized the prize. 
It was the first and last time we visited this Restaurant and I would recommend this place to no one!
reviews.title: I'll never visit this restaurant again!!!

reviews.text: We went out for a dinner and met this little sweet place. Nice service, friendly stuff and owner! And very tasty pizza! Also we got bruscetta and pasta bolognese. The average price is about 10-12$ per person. We were satisfied with our meals and place. If you wandering around - don’t miss it.
reviews.title: Unexpectedly pleasant place

reviews.text: Nice place for evening chill out.  Rather welcoming staff, quiet atmosphere (especially music), free Wi-Fi (that is very rare in Egypt), tasty and fresh food.  There is siting area both indoor and outdoor. Shish is highly recommended (try lemon with mint). Thank you for a nice evening.
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.text:
Nice place to spend evenings outside the hotel. We were walking by La Strada promenade and we were gently invited to have a sit. Nice food items (even some Russian and Ukrainian food), the most tasty fresh mango juice, shrimps to die for...and for sure shisha! It shoukd be noted that shish there costs 5 times less than in Ukraine! And do not forget about huge burger (100% fresh meat), panini and Italian pizza :-) 
Thanks Mokhtar (the owner of the restaurant) for looking after us so well. We will be back in October, see you soon!
reviews.title: The best restaurant in Nabq 👌

reviews.text: As lovers of iced coffee, my wife and I were really chuffed to discover the wonderful array of iced non alcoholic cocktails available at this restaurant.
reviews.title: Good food great iced drinks

location.address: La Strada Mall Nabq, Sharm El Sheikh 12345 Egypt

name: Fares Seafood - IL Mercato
rankingString: #40 of 355 places to eat in Sharm El Sheikh

reviews.text:
I and my wife went to dine in last night. The staff are pushy and want to sell you things you don’t want. There is only one menu that shows prices of appetizers. There is no listed prices for fish. They keep saying that prices are being changed on daily basis. It’s an approach to trap you. One kilo of shrimp is 32$ which is really expensive 
Please see my receipt. We paid 65$ for two small fishes, one calamari, and 250gm shrimp.

Please ask for menu for fish prices, otherwise you will be junked.
reviews.title: Over priced and no menu for fish prices

reviews.text: The food was delicious the young chef helped us at the entrance un choosing our seafood and gave us many options, the service team were very attentive and tidy and overall atmosphere was good!
reviews.title: Fabulous

reviews.text: we went after many recommendations, but the food was dull, not fresh and the lobster tated frozen after we chose a fresh one
reviews.title: not good

reviews.text: quite popular seafood restaurant with fresh fish and dishes from them. The visitors are mostly local, the staff attentive and helpful.
reviews.title: Really good seafood

reviews.text:
The entire 50mins experience in this restaurant was probably my worst dining experience ever, and I have been traveling a loooooot. This restaurant was advised to us by our hotel as the best seafood in Sharm. From the moment we stepped into this restaurant, to the moment we left it, it was stressful and disappointing and borderline angering. 
After having ordered from the fresh fish section (make sure you ask the price of what you are ordering: I have ordered lobster for 45$ per kg, which seemed a quite high price  and insisted that they weight it in front of me), hardly had we managed to sit down and not even yet opened the menu, when the pushy waiters started to put pressure on us by suggesting things to order. after mentioning several times that we'd like to see the menu first, we eventually gave in since they were becoming unhappy, rude and extremely pushy. This resulted in a bill way higher than what we were expecting, which wouldn't have happened had we left in peace to make our order. 
As for the food, I had ordered lobster which was dry, overcooked, and the best part (the claws) cut out and according to the waiters, thrown away. The fresh grilled fish tasted like defrosted and also dry and not even properly salted. 

Our visit to this restaurant was waste of our time, money and resulted in a spoilt mood. If you however decide to visit this place, which I'd strongly advise against, make sure you don't let the staff to push you around and stand your grounds.
reviews.title: Pushy staff/overpriced seafood/non-edible and overcooked

reviews.text: We enjoyed our meals there my wife insist that we should visit this restaurant again even I was looking forward trying other places , the food was nice and delicious 😋 team was amazing 😍 and value for money 💵 was good considering that it was sea ⛵ food restaurant
reviews.title: Excellent experience

reviews.text: I recommend this restaurant . Very tasty and delicious see food .tasty lobster and shrimp with butter . Shrimp with cream and cheese is very delicious
reviews.title: Very nice see food restaurant

reviews.text: Had a great lunch with local fish and Arabic mezze. The prices are pretty reasonable and the service is clean and fast. No need to wait long to enjoy good food
reviews.title: Best Local Fish/Seafood Place

photos.caption: one of the best lunches
1kg of fresh grilled fish

reviews.text: Nice place and the sea food soup os very tasty I think that branch at El Mirkato more quite than 2nd branch old market because at old market is busy and crowded ,the staff is also friendly and helpful , I don't recommend  red pasta I don't like it , they have a huge fish there I advice you to tale a picture with it 😀
reviews.title: Nice place and good sea food

reviews.text:
I’m a seafood lover and always check out different seafood restaurants ;)
This place had a good food, I wouldn’t say excellent but I enjoyed it.

The most important thing is ALWAYS CHECK YOUR BILL AND ASK THE PRICE PER KILO BEFORE YOUR ORDER!

We order Omar because they were out of lobsters, so after we pick 2 big ones, the chef weighed them in front of us and it was 1,75 kilograms and we asked the pride it was 1100 pounds per kilo.

When we got our bill we saw that he wrote there that we ordered 2,1 kilo omar and the price magically changed to 1200 pounds per kilo

So when we asked what happened, the manager made up the story that he decided changed one of the omars because apparently it was dead LOL it was pretty alive when we picked it up!

And the price he said he was talking about other fish and we miss understood him.
We requested to change the price and the weight that we agreed on at the beginning. Even though the manager wasn’t happy but at the end he did changed it and we saved 75$

The reason why we checked our Bill because the table before us had the same problem!!!

So enjoy your food and BE AWARE!
reviews.title: ALWAYS CHECH YOUR BILL!!!

location.address: Sharm Elysees Street - IL Mercato Hadaba, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt

name: sinai star
rankingString: #43 of 355 places to eat in Sharm El Sheikh

reviews.text:
What a wonderful place! Not so beautiful outside like some other close there but...incredibly hig quality food and service starting from the young waiters till the very kind owner. 
Everything was perfect, price included, not the cheapest one but very very honest compared to quality! 
Absolutely the best fish eaten in Sharm!
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.text: The first impression does not make us expect such good food. We were at this restaurant with friends at the beginning of September. All the dishes tasted great. Delicious sauces for starters. Very tasty soups (I recommend the Thai style seafood soup especially) and very good main courses with fish, lobster and shrimps. A small disadvantage for not being able to order beer or wine, but I understand that it is due to the prevailing religious culture.
reviews.title: Very good restaurant with local seafood

reviews.text: Exceptionally good sea food that will definitely nurture your soul! A hidden gem and best place to dine in sharm, not to mention the exceptional service and complementary drinks and shrimp garlic appetizer that will leave you in awe.
reviews.title: Exceptionally good sea food

reviews.text: We’re very hungry so we just tried to check the menu outside how is. The guy jumped there and he took the menu from my hand. He wanted to sell us (6 people) the biggest plate. I had an argue with him. After 5-10 min finally we got back the menu and we could sit down. We ordered drinks for first and he forgot the half of the order i had to ask 2-3 more times for my beer and the best was: he just put a bottle of wine on our table but he didn’t open it or anything. Then we tried to order food. At the first order he tried to push me again to buy the biggest plate which was the most expensive of course. I ask for chips, he said is not available...CHIPS! He said they don’t have now, they will get after 3 days. Then i ask for the bill ( of course we didn’t eat there) and he tried to fool me with 50 pounds. I don’t recommend it at all. Dirty and the staff even doesn’t know which planet where they are.. really confused all of them.
reviews.title: Never more

reviews.text: A friend recommended this hidden gem within the souk and I’m so glad we went there. We ordered so much seafood and it was all fresh and cooked for perfection. The lobster and seafood soup is a must!! My husband ordered the eel and he said it was the best eel he’s ever had. The staff where so friendly and offered us free dessert and gave us a large bottle of fresh mango juice to take home. It was so good we went back a few days later again.
reviews.title: Great food and exceptional customer service

reviews.text: I used to come to this restaurant, exclusively prior to the 2011 revolution. Since then, I haven’t really had the chance to make it down to Sharm much - until tonight. It’s as if time had stood still. The owner welcomed me back, immediately served me fresh mango juice to moisten our throats from the long walk while we caught up with each other and it just got better from there. You know that when you come back to a favorite place 8 years later and you are still a queen and the food is still as exquisite, it’s a gem of a place!!!
reviews.title: Kindness-generosity-delicious

reviews.text: The food is amazing it is fresh and well cooked and the service is excellent. The fried calamari is the best and the fish tajen was delicious. Overall Very recommend
reviews.title: Great seafood

reviews.text: Our group got refused because of being Asian, So bare in mind if you consider to spend your dinner here, i personally hated it, it was the first time in my life being treated like that
reviews.title: Racist people

reviews.text: We had a chance to taste their dishes and salads, I advise travellers to skip the seafood rice, and choose the salads carefully. Main fish dishe was good. You may try shrimps but it was iver priced.for me.
reviews.title: Tasty and slightly overpriced

reviews.text: A great location at sharm I enjoyed with a tasty food fish and I walked at old market it's nicely placed
reviews.title: Tasty

name: El Masrien Grill Restaurant
rankingString: #42 of 355 places to eat in Sharm El Sheikh

reviews.text:
Always visit when in Sharm but it has gotten worse and worse over the last few years. If you speak Arabic and know what you want you will be treated very different. 
DO NOT ACCEPT WAITERS SUGGESTIONS 
You will get lots of bits of not much substance. Poor quality meat used , fatty and bones , dips watered down, and the cost is overpriced. 
Best thing sandwich or wrap outside , worst thing. Rude staff who told us where to leave his tip before our food even arrived. 
Bill is in Arabic and they won’t explain cost. Used to enjoy but cold food and rude service is not good enough
reviews.title: Important note for tourists

reviews.text: Most delicious Egyptian food ever eat in sharm the food was amazing and fresh first the salad was perfect and the meat was fresh and juicy the service was quick really I enjoyed the food
reviews.title: You must try it 😋

reviews.text: I got super friendly service. I was about to order a basic meal, then the waiter suggested another one which I tried and was even happier with it! Very soft and well prepared meat. They brought pita bread in plastic bags included in every meal, but after they just happened to bake some new, they changed them to fresh ones without me asking and without any extra charge! The rice pudding desert was great, too. I can only recommend.
reviews.title: Best grill restaurant in Sharm El Sheikh Old Market

reviews.text:
This was recommended by a local but sadly we were not treated like locals 

The waiter was intent on offering a mixed grill when we pointed out exactly what we wanted  on the menu card but even when the food came it was not fresh and substandard almost like they threw on whatever was left over in the BBQ. The meat was dry and overcooked 

Such a shame as the food on the other tables (all locals ) looked fresh and of quality.

Maybe if you go there with someone Egyptian you might get more quality service
reviews.title: Go with a local

reviews.text: As a tourist they try to con you. Went today as solo I wanted a grill the attendant suggested a beef made in oven Ive trusted him, he said was rice on it, when they dish came was full of potatoes and almost none beef they bring me salads and rice and charged me for all of them even when he said was included. At the end end up eating potatoes, rice and almost none meet. End up paying about more than 150 I tough was and at the top they put charges for taxes for potatoes and rice and that two sauces 220 Egyptian pounds. Not nice to treat tourists this way
reviews.title: They conned you

reviews.text:
Good food, however dont expect to enjoy your dinner. The waiters are hoovering over you because the place is so busy that they want to clear the table for the next seating. We wanted dessert but got the check and was asked to hurry up. Didn't even get to finish the drink.
But for the food, excellent!
reviews.title: Dinner

reviews.text: We ordered a mixed grill and a few sides, and the food was very tasty with generous portions. Service was quick to take order and bring food, but trying to get the check from them was quite the accomplishment. I do have to say they were very busy the night we went, but at one point we started to wonder if they’d forgotten about us. After asking the fourth waiter and 20minutes later we were able to pay our bill and leave. So, if you visit this restaurant you’re on “Egyptian time” - don’t come in a hurry. Prices were reasonable in our opinion as we only paid about $12 for a mixed grill, four sides and two drinks
reviews.title: Tasty food, reasonably priced

reviews.text: It's a famous restaurants served different oriental dishes. I tried stuffed vegetables and grilled fletto which is tender I like it.
reviews.title: Tender fletto

reviews.text: A warm welcome and a comfortably cool temperature restaurant. Authentic food on offer. Starters were brought out for us to choose along with a light Egyptian style 'pitta' bread. Mains of half Duck, chicken fajita were HUGE portions. I had four BBQ lamb chops that were delicious (plenty of fat left on that was well charred). There was traditional rice (that was baked in an oven dish with pieces of meat) that was reminiscent of rice pudding). Vegetarian option was vegetable tagine that looked very good. Service was good and main waiter spoke good English.
reviews.title: A 'feast' in Sharm El Sheikh

reviews.text: A must visit and try, fantastic staff and the best sesame prawn toast I have ever had!!! Excellent value for money, we will be going back.
reviews.title: Fantastic food

reviews.text:
Had yet another fantastic meal at Mango again tonight.  Food is phenomenal.  There was 5 of us and every one commented on how delicious their meal was.  I forgot to say I didn't like peppers and when my meal come and the waiter saw me removing them from my meal, he took my meal and replaced it with a fresh one minus the peppers!  He did this without me even asking.  This was so nice of them to do for me.

The service was outstanding. Sadly I did not get the waiters name (I will next time) but he was excellent.  He was polite and efficient and extremely helpful.

The prices are a little high but cos we are residents here we got some discount, which made our visit even more enjoyable
reviews.title: Delicious

reviews.text: Thanks to the one who suggested (mango Chinese restaurant )for me it was a good choice, the stuff treatment made me feel as we are a family, the food was absolute amazing ; thanks to the chef, the stuff,and the manager of this amazing place .

reviews.text: The most beautiful and most amazing cuisine is Thai cuisine.  Especially when the 👨🏾‍🍳chef from Thailand cooks himself.  We were lucky enough to visit the Thai restaurant Sala Thai.  It was very tasty😋, the staff is polite, the kitchen is open there, so you can see the whole cooking process live.  Thank you very much for the warm welcome
reviews.title: The best place to eat special food you want to know about Thai cuisine just come to this place and eat something 😘

reviews.text: The best restaurant in Sharm .I was surprised the food is exactly like in thailand.Everything very tasty .Also service at a high level .Best thanks to Hassan

reviews.text: Beautiful, cozy place.Thanks to the staff for good service and delicious food.I recommend this restaurant

reviews.text:
Excellent, just excellent.  
Food is delicious, just like in Thailand, service is amazing, thanks to Mohamed, restaurant manager. We enjoyed it a lot.
reviews.title: Sala Thai

reviews.text: I came with my wife and booked for outdoors 6 hours prior and then they called to push the booking and when we arrived there at the time they gave us the receptionist didn’t have any written confirmation and kept asking me for a booking. Then he runs back to the manager and when I ask the manager what was going on he’s like we are sorry we don’t have a booking outdoor for you as we’re full. I then explain how rude and disrespectful that is after we came all the way out here for dinner. He proposed to sit indoors but it is not worth it to do so and we could have gone anywhere else for a nice restaurant with a view.  I politely left because after the manager was being useless as he just stood there with nothing to say or even acknowledged their mistake  or his ill management.
reviews.title: Bad manager and management

reviews.text: I called to make a booking for today at 3 PM for tonight at 8:30. I asked to be seated outdoors for 2 for my husbands birthday. It was confirmed. Around 2 hours later they called and postponed our booking for 9 PM which was already unprofessional but we accepted. We showed up at 9 PM, our booking was obviously not made as the person at the front couldn’t find our name, he then went to the manager who proceeded to tell us they have no place outside and we can sit in. He tried to excuse himself and say the reception at the hotel was the one who managed our booking although I know very well that was not the case because I was transfered to the restaurant from the reception. He then proceeded to just stand there and look at us without even apologizing as though we were supposed to just come up with a solution while rolling his eyes at me anytime I spoke about how this was an issue on their end. We left, and ofcourse my husband was not able to celebrate his birthday because it was too late to get a booking elsewhere. Never coming back here again, terrible organization and horrible management. It is shameful to hear about a nice place that is so I’ll managed.
reviews.title: Terrible experience

reviews.text: We had there dinner twice, there is a Thai chef which also explained us all about the cooking. Every time he came by and asked if all is ok. I would highly recommend that this restaurant could be part of the all inclusive package (once or twice in a week) This was next to the beach and the coral banks the highlight of the stay at Park Regency
reviews.title: Excellent Thai food

reviews.text: The Thai chef is back and the food is superb again. The atmosphere is lovely and it is the perfect place for a special occasion. The waiters were all great and they even made a birthday cake at short notice. We will be back!
reviews.title: Fantastic thai food and view

reviews.text:
The ambience is very quiet and relaxing with a nice (but slightly dark) view of the hotel and beach. 

The service is very professional and friendly. 

We ordered the set menu, which had a good variety of thai food and was more than enough for three people. The food was delicious and the dessert plate of fried banana and fresh fruit was simple yet very fresh and tasty. Presentation of the food was also great. 

Overall, an enjoyable experience. We would definitely be back at Sala Thai next time we visit Sharm El Sheikh.
reviews.title: Delicious food and Relaxing atmosphere

reviews.text:
Food is absolutely great.
Ingredients are fresh and perfect
Cook is artful and talented 
Service is professional and disciplined 
However
1. Mosquitos all over the place 
2. In case outside guest, security at the gate will make your life miserable until he lets you in😁
reviews.title: In/outdoors Full Of Mosquitos....Food Is Delicious

name: Bus Stop Nabq
rankingString: #38 of 355 places to eat in Sharm El Sheikh

reviews.text: Food is really nice, good vibes and music. Staff are really lovely. And they have a pool table which is good
reviews.title: Miss

reviews.text: While in nabq bay these past 2 weeks , a few people from our hotel had told us about this restaurant . Myself and my partner thought we would give it ago as the food in our hotel wasn't to the best of standards . To say we were not disappointed . The food was amazing , we both had the ' bus stop ' burger and fries alongside starters as well and drinks . The staff were lovely,  happy to chat and also asked how our meal was . We went back twice while we were there and both times meals were fantastic . Would definitely recommend if you are in the area 👍
reviews.title: Lovely atmosphere , great food 👌 very good for prices

reviews.text:
Me and my friend came here late one evening-she had just arrived and her flight was delayed, so we missed the evening meal at our hotel. We were looking for something close by and easy food, so this fit the bill.
It was coming up to midnight and even though they looked like they were finishing soon/kitchen closed, they were happy to accommodate us with a limited menu. 
I'd heard of the Bus Stop before visiting Nabq, so was aware of The Bus Stop Burger, but unfortunately this was not available as the main chef had gone home. I settled on a SeaFood Pasta-my friend the same. We also got a bottle of white wine with the meal.
The owner chatted to us for a few minutes-quite normal-but then one of the staff members pulled up a chair for him and he literally sat there for the whole meal until we left.
Bear in mind, my friend had just arrived, so we were chatting away between mouthfuls of food and enjoying the wine. Yet the owner continued to sit there.....initially just small talk-where you from/staying/for how long-then very quickly moving onto how he knows/owns this and that, can get us into xyz for free, can book this trip, that trip. Yes, I  half listened as some of it might had been useful, but it became me and my friend chatting, him saying we talk too quickly-we were talking to each other-with him trying to 'sell/give us contacts' whenever we weren't talking/were eating. Yes, he might had been genuine, but I've been to Egypt often enough, to know that 99.9% of time they are always on the sell/want something. Also, I don't want to be tied to some guy for our holiday-no Thank You.
Anyway, the food was actually nice and the wine was lovely. The venue is pretty cool aswell. It's a modern sports bar. I would had returned for the Women's England opener, but as I wanted an unmithering evening, I went to The Union Jack..........
reviews.title: Excellent-if the manager didn't sit with us all the way through our meal

reviews.text: There is No kids menu at all.  There is also only a few burgers and a salad to choose from.   Unhelpful staff.
reviews.title: No choice.

reviews.text:
The atmosphere is lovely!
The best thing about the place is the food (burgers 🍔 ) and cocktails 🍹 
It's a big sports bar with all the sports being streamed live
If you are British 🇬🇧 you will love it.
reviews.title: Awesome food and cocktails!

reviews.text: Service with a lovely smile,but the food was below average and so was the drinks. The restaurant is fun with loads to entertain the kids.
reviews.title: Average

reviews.text: If you're in Sharm and want to watch football would recommend here, good beer and food not bad price and right on the strip
reviews.title: Good place to watch football

reviews.text:
The Bus Stop is across the road from our hotel. Even though we were all inclusive we like to go out for a wander at night. Found this bar on our first night. Had a few drinks and played pool. (Which was free). Went back several nights for drinks and pool. On our last night we had dinner here. Starters were nice. But the main course was the star of the show. The burgers were amazing. The best ones we had for a while. And the homemade fries/chips were great as well. 

The staff were very friendly and nothing we asked for was an issue . They also have live music not sure if it is every night. 

If you fancy something different just go and see them. You won’t be disappointed!
reviews.title: Our favourite place!

reviews.text: Really enjoyed our meal staff was excellent fresh hot food cooked to a English standard place was spotless couldn’t fault it at all 1st time since arriving in sharm my son actually emptied his plate and asked for more can’t wait to try there Christmas dinner after eating tonight I’ve booked in
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.text:
If you're like us and staying in one of the many all-inclusive hotels around here, this place is an absolute treat, and the only place with a vegan burger that we've seen (which is delicious, btw).
Also, this places serves chippy style chips!
Great service, all the staff are very friendly and helpful and the prices are very good, too.
There's sport on the tvs both outside and inside and an American pool table outside too.
Definitely recommended!
reviews.title: Great service, delicious food and a fantastic vegan burger!

location.address: El Salam Road La Strada Mall, Nabq Bay, Sharm El Sheikh 41000 Egypt

reviews.text:
I've been to sharm for about 30 years.
I popped into Buddha yesterday and had a chat with one of the staff, no problem he explained there was a good night ti be had on Saturday the 24/25 September.
I had 12 friends who wanted a good night out, ( happy to spend)
I went to the club at about 01:30 to check all was OK and to see if the club was active.
I approached the door staff, I found them extremely "passive aggressive,"

No welcome, no smiles, no kerb appeal , in fact the opposite, I waited a few minutes to see If any attitudes changed, they didn't , this was ALL the front door staff. They were Passive aggressive to everyone, even people that had pre paid booked or had the correct bracelets.

We went back to our hotel and continued our night.

I will visit tomorrow to speak with management.

My friends were looking forward to a good long night of fun ,TOTALLY ruined by the passive aggressive attitude of the door staff.

Sorry Buddha you need to address your door staff attitudes.

Ithings  need to change dramatically.

Staff training  on tourist hospitality,  not aggressive postures and expressions.

Regards J T
reviews.title: Bad attitude door staff

reviews.text:
The decor is gorgeous, very lush . 
Food is mediocre, drinks were better. 
But the bill is expensive once you add Egyptian tax, service charge and then entry charge, a lot of unnecessary extras if you ask me.  
Visit if you would like a a bit of luxury but it’s not a must do !
reviews.title: Lush decor

reviews.text: We had a very nice und specially evening at the little Buddha!! You can have free and tasty drinks up to 00:00 o‘clock

reviews.text:
We had the best food along with the best service and at very decent prices.
It’s became our dinner headquarters for a week and I can only recommend this place without any doubt
reviews.title: One of the best restaurants in Sharm El Sheikh, 5 golden stars….loved it !

reviews.text: I had dinner at Little Buddha three times. The location is great. The staff were friendly and helpful. The sushi were excellent. Highly recommended!

reviews.text: Do not visit. They will charge you an entrance fee and the waiter wants more tip. Plus cocktails are just plain juice no alcohol.

reviews.title: They keep stealing you even if u r VIP. I thought they are different but I was mistaken.

reviews.text: We live in Sharm and eat here almost weekly. We have never had a bad meal; the quality of the food is higher than other local restaurants. The staff is always kind and helpful. The COVID scare has diminished the clientele; however, the food remains really fresh.

reviews.text: its a modern night club , good place but also affected by covid 19 pandemic , not crowded like the normal days , close at 12 am this a rules of all sharm el sheikh night clubs.

reviews.text:
If you've never tried Indian food before, this is the best place to taste it at sharm. If you are good with spices, do not miss it. Although I don't like very spicy, I did taste it.
The weather was not very hot from March, so we could eat comfortably. I would like to thank all the staff of Tandoori.
reviews.title: best place to taste indian food.

reviews.text: Despite it's an open air restaurant, with 40C+ in sharm during summer, but it's really amazing restaurant, with perfect tasty food .
reviews.title: Best Indian Restaurant in Sharm

reviews.text: This is an amazing place that I love to go to every single time I visit Sharm. I always enjoy the atmosphere and the sheer spectacle of this restaurant. The food is cooked by actual Indian chefs and the creation they make is unbelievably delicious! This is by far the best Indian restaurant I have ever been to with the best and tastiest and loveliest Indian food in the world!
reviews.title: BEST INDIAN FOOD

owner_response.text:
Dear saaramadan,
Thank you for your 5 star review. We are pleased to read your nice comments about our award-winning Indian restaurant which is temporary closed for renovation. We do aim to offer good value of money as well as high quality, so it's great to know that you found our food to be “unbelievably delicious”. We hope that you will have a chance to visit us soon to taste your favourite Indian dishes.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: I am quite a fan of Indian food and I eat it usually once a week. This is the best I have eaten so far. Tasty fresh fragrant and amazing! The staff are attentive but let you enjoy your food undisturbed. I have been to sharm 6 times over the years and I intend to go again soon. To dine here is definitely  a highlight.
reviews.title: The best so far

owner_response.text:
Dear Joseph A,
What a lovely review! We are flattered by your nice comments about our award-winning Indian Tandoori restaurant. It’s nice to read that our restaurant is a must-visit for you while you are in Sharm and that you think of our food as the best you have eaten. Please note that our restaurant is currently closed for renovation, but hopefully you will have a chance to taste your favourite Tandoori food soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: We always go to the Tandoori for one dinner when we are in Na'ama Bay. You have to go into the Camel Hotel or through the Pomodoro to get to the restaurant which is in a courtyard with an open roof.  Food is always great and the service excellent.
reviews.title: Great Indian resturant in Naama Bay

owner_response.text:
Dear bungeyboy2015,
Many thanks for reviewing us on TripAdvisor. We are truly delighted to be a “great Indian restaurant” to your opinion. Our award-winning restaurant (currently close for renovation) is located in the heart of Naama Bay and offers a wide choice of authentic Indian meals in addition to the relaxing courtyard atmosphere and attentive service. Thank you again for your valuable feedback.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: This place on top of the Camel bar not in nicest position in town. food beautifully prepared but very slow service and very expensive. staff were good.
reviews.title: tandoori heat

owner_response.text:
Dear keith h,
Thank you for visiting Tandoori and for sharing your informative review. We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed our food and friendly service. Our award-winning restaurant is known as a “hidden gem in Naama Bay” for its authentic Indian food cooked right in front of you. The restaurant (currently closed for renovation) is located in the courtyard of Camel Hotel, but we serve some dishes from our Tandoori menu as well in Camel Bar which you have mentioned. Please accept our apologies for the slow service. We truly hope that this glitch did not compromise your overall experience. Offering a high standard of service is one of our top priorities and this is why we value so much our guests’ feedback. Reviews are for us an essential tool, which we use to improve our performance. We appreciate the time you dedicated to write your comment, which gave us the opportunity to reinforce the importance of an excellent customer service to our Team. Our prices are comparable to other restaurants in Sharm El Sheikh, and we aim to offer all our guests a dining experience that is good value for money. Thanks again for you review.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Very pleasant little Indian restaurant in the middle of the Camel Dive shop. Menu with plenty of options and efficient service. They have an onsite tandoor oven so make great breads and tandoori chicken!
reviews.title: Good Indian

owner_response.text:
Dear youmeiyou,
We are more then happy to read your nice review about our award-winning Indian restaurant. Thank you for sharing your comments with other travelers. We aim to offer the high quality food and service at our restaurant which is known like a "hidden gem" in the heart of Naama Bay. It's a great pleasure to know that you enjoyed your dinner at Tandoori and were satisfied with our efficient service. Thanks again for reviewing Tandoori restaurant.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: seems a change of chef has plunged this place downward. In past years the food was excellent....although Kenian curry it was well cooked, tasty, little expensive...but wont go anymore. in fact Jan 2016 it wasn't open !
reviews.title: lost it !

owner_response.text:
Dear marilyn s,
Thank you for taking you time to review us on TripAdvisor.  We're sorry to hear that you were disappointed with your last visit to our restaurant. Our aim is to offer our guests high quality authentic Indian food with attentive service. Our prices are comparable to other restaurants in Sharm El Sheikh, and we aim to offer all our guests a dining experience that is good value for money, so we're very sorry to hear that you found our curry a bit expensive. We are surprised to read that our award-winning chef from Delhi didn’t meet your expectations. Our restaurant is well-known among Sharm visitors and residents who come to our restaurant to try delicious authentic Indian food freshly cooked by Chef Abhay in the open air kitchen. As you correctly mentioned, Tandoori restaurant is currently closed for renovation. Once again, thanks for your valuable feedback and we do hope that you would visit our restaurant again in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Ate here with a group of six friends, we all thought the food was great. Prices a bit high by Sharm standards but the quality was very good, with nice linen and cutlery so well worth it. Service friendly but not intrusive.
reviews.title: Best Indian food in Sharm

owner_response.text:
Dear MermanTim,
Thank you for reviewing your recent experience at our Indian restaurant in Naama Bay. We are very happy to know that you’ve visited both our restaurants: Tandoori and Italian inspired Pomodoro restaurant and that you and your friends were satisfied with both. It’s very pleasant to know that you liked the authentic Indian meal, we appreciate your comment about “the best Indian food in Sharm” – it’s a great compliment to all our team. We hope to welcoming you here again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Food was good and as expected for an Indian meal in Egypt. Was very surprised at paying over £50 for food and drink for 2.

name: Melodies
rankingString: #41 of 355 places to eat in Sharm El Sheikh

reviews.text: Couldn't wish for a nicer place. Honestly 2 weeks in Egypt 🇪🇬  all inclusive our hotel food was terrible and we ate McDonald's nearly every night. One evening we stumbled across Melodies and the staff and food was amazing we had such a great meal and the staff was so warm and welcoming. Before we left we said can we book a table for 2 nights time as it our sons 18th. Mohammed promised us he will save our table and even get banners, balloons and a birthday cake for our return. Je took a risk as we didn't pay a deposit yet like him we stuck to our word and so did he and upon arrival he gave us a birthday corner. His staff sung happy birthday in 4 different languages and again the food was amazing. I wished we found this place on day one as the prices was very fair and honestly could have charged more as the quality was fab. Thankyou to your team we still speak about you now as you made our holiday. Thankyou if we return to Egypt this is the 1st place we will visit
reviews.title: Best restaurant in Egypt

The White Elephant absolutely made our holiday. We were really impressed with the hotel anyway; however having a meal at the White Elephant (on our 1st wedding anniversary) was the next level.

If this was a restaurant in England, they’d be charging a hell of a lot of money for the service we had. Thank you!

reviews.text: The worst. Stuff tries make you pay more. Be careful with this place and always count. Also stuff says first one thing then another.
reviews.title: Worst

reviews.text: We went here for a couple sociable drinks and didn't end up leaving till gone 3am, was the best night out ever. The place had great music, great service and amazing staff. They always went above and beyond and were great at helping. We watched football and cricket here and loved the food we were served and would 100% recommend a roast dinner here! The guys who run it are amazing and the DJ to dance away to was playing some amazing tunes. This is a secret GEM! Can't wait to come back!
reviews.title: BEST NIGHT OUT EVER

reviews.text: Went there several times on my last trip in February . Had the Sunday roast twice still good . Hope more people start to go to Sharm.
reviews.title: Sunday roast good

reviews.text: Despite the downturn in UK visitors and all inclusive trying to kill off any independent businesses the Tavern is still going strong and is still well worth a visit.
reviews.title: Still hanging in there.

reviews.text: To anyone who is revisiting Sharm the old favourite Tavern Bar is still open for business. Although we only visited early one evening for a quick drink mainly to see if it had survived the lack of tourism  visiting Sharm. It has! It was always a good fun place in the evening and I’m sure it will be again. There is a decent selection of alcohol and beer on tap. Can’t give it a better rating as we didn’t go later in the evening to check it out further. The main reason for this review is to inform the people who frequently used it while in Sharm it is open for business
reviews.title: Still open

reviews.text: Fish and chips is my vice at home and I've yet to see it look appealing on a menu, decided to give it a go British style and it was delicious! The batter was the way I like it. Drinks were made to order as well which was great. Great price as well, will definitely be back!
reviews.title: Perfect fish and chips

reviews.text: What a find. A busy English bar serving English Sunday lunch that you had to book for in advance and at a great price. Lots of TV screens. A little noisy at times but thats to be expected.
reviews.title: British Bar with Sunday Lunch

reviews.text: This is a fabulous bar recently refurbished and atmosphere is welcoming and friendly with good music and large video screen. The Sunday roast was tasty and great value so too battered fish and large crispy chips. The cost is great value. We visited at quiet times but also on party nights and enjoyed both with great bunch of expats who live in Sharm.
reviews.title: Great bar great staff

Soho Square Management

reviews.text:
Hard rock cafe nabq bay - Sharm el sheikh.
Had an excellent dinner here.
The food/drinks were delicious and the service was excellent.
We had starter's -i had boneless chicken strips and my partner had nachos. The started were excellent and the portions were massive. It would surpass as a main meal. We had a huge cocktail each which allowed you to take the glasses home and the electric blue cocktail was very packed with alcohol but tasted great. 
Also we had a sprite each which included a free refill which was good.  
The mains were burgers, i had the country burger and my partner had a plant based burger. These were both delicious and came with excellent fries and fantastic dipping sauce. 
It was a great atmosphere with excellent rock music to listen to. 
At the end of the meal the waiter called a taxi for us and then we could wait at our table and they informed us when it arrived. 
The bill was £56 which I thought was very reasonable for the quality and quantity of the food, drinks and excellent service.
reviews.title: Fantastic meal

Hard Rock Cafe was a fantastic dining experience, and we were lucky to have Mina as our waiter. He provided us with excellent service and went out of his way to make our evening special. Mina's knowledge of the menu and recommendations were spot on, and he ensured that we had everything we needed throughout our meal.

Now, the food - it was simply delicious! Each dish was cooked to perfection and had a burst of flavors that was a delight to the taste buds. The ambiance of the restaurant was also great, with cool rock music and a laid-back atmosphere.

Overall, I highly recommend Hard Rock Cafe for anyone looking for an exceptional dining experience with great food and service. And if you have the pleasure of being served by Mina, you're in for an extra special treat!

My fourth time back with a 20 year gap between this and the third. 

What can I say. EXCELLENT! They still do the seafood crêpe, packed with squid, prawn and a whole soft shell crab In delicious sauce. Pic doesn’t do it justice. 

For mains I had mixed grill of lamb kofta, lamb cutlet, veal fillet, veal sweetbreads and beef fillet. Tess had surf n turf - prime rib with one and a half baby lobsters. 

SUPERB, SUBLIME, SUCCULENT, SENSATIONAL. 

We’re here for a couple of weeks and will be back at least three or four times this trip. 

I’ve eaten all over Egypt - including some pretty fancy-pants places in Cairo. This place is the best.

reviews.text:
Came back again to my favorite spot in Sharm El-Sheikh, this time was showing my friends the place where the amazing view and music. Ordered few nice cocktails and the nicest bullfrog jar ever. Staff were very friendly as usual. They did me a great gesture when they knew its my friend's birthday, they served us the most delicious chocolate cake with H. B. D on and his name. The manager (Devin) was so sweet to put the song with candles. Friendly atmosphere and we had great time there.
N.B: Have to admit the cleanest bathrooms too.
reviews.title: Best birthday

owner_response.text:
Dear Y925ORcolinm,

Thank you for your feedback. We always like to hear from our guests and appreciate your effort and very sorry to hear that you missed out on your match.We have six screens in the indoor Camel Bar showing different games and a sports schedule is issued twice a week on our Facebook page and in the bar. In regards tou your situation, i recall that we just closed down the inside sports bar upon your arrival because there was only like 15 minutes left in the match and no guests came into watch the any of the matches at  all that night. During slow season we usually keep the bar downstairs only open if we have guests in the bar. We could have reopened the bar for you to watch the rest of the match no problem. Glad that you still enjoyed a beer with us on our roof bar instead.
Thanks again for your feedback.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

Fabulous little find
Really clean (amazing toilets), great vibe and décor.
Excellent friendly service and great food.

Happy hour is 6-7.30pm although the drinks aren't that much more expensive after.
We went 3 nights out of 7 and really loved it.

Food is really good and is linked to the kitchen of the Italian Restaurant downstairs, Pomodora, which is also great.

One night we just has a mix of starters to eat and another we had a main meal.

We went in January and it can get a little cold at night but they have outdoor heaters and with a jumper its fine.

I would definitely recommend it

owner_response.text:
Dear pittzilla,

Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your effort.
We are sorry to hear that your visit to our bar was somehow not satisfactory.
You may not be aware that all local items in Egypt are now subject to higher sales taxes and VAT in comparison to the past. Our prices are competitive to the prices of similar places in Sharm. We are not willing to put the quality of our food  at risk to be able to lower our prices. 
In addition to this, imported items have incurred in higher custom fees which, along with the devaluation of the Egyptian Pound, obviously have a direct impact on our costs.
We always aim to the best quality standards and in order to provide the quality service which we aim to and which makes us different from many similar businesses in Sharm. We have conducted price comparisons with other operating bars in the area and strived to maintain reasonable pricing without compromising on the quality of service and hygiene maintenance in all our outlets.
We do provide promotions for our guests to enjoy discounted drinks during Happy Hour every day 6 -730 pm.
We have recently organized live music during various events and we always like to keep guests informed about our events on social media. Somewhat suprised to hear as well that you where somewhat unhappy with the rooftops atmosphere. As you can see from previous reviews from other guests at camel thats one of there best expeirences is in fact the fabulos atmosphere.

Thank you again for your review.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

location.address: Camel Hotel, Centre of Naama Bay, Sharm El Sheikh 46619 Egypt

name: The Beach Luxury Club
rankingString: #22 of 355 places to eat in Sharm El Sheikh

reviews.text:
What to expect (this time of the year): 
1) Vigorous security - they will ask you to step out of your taxi, open a trunk, and provide your passport info, log that information into a book and ask questions about purpose of your visit, multiple times. 
2) No live music or dj and limited food. We came at 3:40pm and there was no DJ and to our horror no food. Restaurant is closed between 3:30pm and 7pm. So enjoy your salad with tuna from a can - the only option at that time. Dj as we were told was to restart at 16:00 but that did not happen. 
3)Worst cocktail - they made pina colada using canned pineapple and it tasted like third degree drink not worth the money with no flavor or taste. 
4)Topless beach. Just FYI, if that’s your thing.
5)In all fairness, place has potential but the above just made it for some pretty disappointing experience
reviews.title: Disappointing experience

reviews.text: We had dinner at the restaurant The Beach and we can honestly say that the quality and flavors of the food prepared were excellent and the different ingredients used, paired really well with the wines they offered. The menu is well structured and inclusive with the drinks menu also being great, with a special emphasis on the wine selection. The only thing we would like to warn before hand is that a single appetizer is suitable to be shared between two people. The staff and service is also very thoughtful, as they are always making sure you have enough of drinks and food on the table. Overall it was a very memorable and impressionable evening experience with a suitable dinner beach ambient and excellent food and drink options, that we are sure we would recommend to others as well - both couples and families.
reviews.title: Visit to The Beach restaurant, 2022

location.address: Soho Square, Sharm El Sheikh 169 Egypt

name: Luxor
rankingString: #21 of 355 places to eat in Sharm El Sheikh

reviews.text:
Egyptian, Indian, Thai and Chinese all under one roof… or outside on one terrace. 

Quality doesn’t suffer as it might do in the UK with a similar set up. We can see only assume each of the four restaurants has its own kitchen as the food feels, looks and tastes authentic. 

First night in Egypt so we opted for Luxor’s native fare. Appetisers of calves liver and peppers, tahini and salad were spot on. Mains of lamb fattah and chicken shish tawook similarly so. Fattah is spiced boiled lamb/beef served over a bed of rice and toasted pita bread with a delicious garlicky warm tomato sauce. A feast in your mouth.

Not diluted for tourist tastes they offer authentic local cuisine such as soup or a main dish made with cows feet. I’m a fan of pigs trotters when cooked well so I’m going for the bovine version on my next trip. 

Egyptian wine is surprisingly good with red being a bit more like a reasonable French plonk than you’d think. Just as well as French and Italian wines are at eye watering prices - Orvieto (a fiver in the UK and overpriced at that!) is over £100 a bottle!

Staff all great, friendly and efficient.
reviews.title: Marvellous mix and match meals

reviews.text: We arrived into Sharm in the evening and decided to have something to eat in Soho Square as the hotel restaurant was closed. The Indian restaurant was full but Luxor - Egyptian was available. We had to wait 20 minutes to be served and that’s after asking. We ordered a simple mixed grill and 2 drinks. Our food arrived after 25 minutes and drinks just before. The chicken was undercooked and at first we thought it was just the way they present or cook their meat. I only took a small bite and it was disgusting. It was too rubbery so we left the food and got charged £35. The next day I had food poisoning and called the doctor. I was in excruciating pain for hours and had to keep going to the bathroom. Next early morning I was on a drip and tablets in my hotel room. We hadn’t eaten anywhere else as that was our first meal in Egypt. I was put off chicken the whole holiday and was on medication for 4 days. Really poor service, besides the chicken, the other food was awful too. The portions are small, tasteless, expensive and you are not served any bread or dips with your meal. The customer service was atrocious. We wanted to try the Indian there but the same people own the 4 restaurants so we didn’t go there. Thank god the food in our hotel Savoy was superb every single day and each meal was delicious! I would not recommend Luxor in Soho Square to anyone.
reviews.title: Awful food - food poisoning

name: Mai Thai
rankingString: #23 of 355 places to eat in Sharm El Sheikh

reviews.text:
Lots of excellent reviews on Trip advisor for the Thai part of the combined restaurant on Soho Square, though suspiciously a lot from people with only a single review... Still we live Thai food so we headed there on the first night of our trip.

Sadly my wife's soup was very lacking in flavour - tasted watered down - and my chicken satay were dry with the peanut sauce not even tasting of nuts.  The mains were ok, but still very bland and not at all spicy.  Maybe they were made plain for tourists, but it was not what we are used to.

Good service and decent prices but only Egyptian wine available for a sensible price and that takes a bit of getting used to. Imported wine available starting at about £150 per bottle !
reviews.title: Bland thai food

reviews.text:
We had a great meal at Mai Thai. The food was exceptional, as was the service. There was an extremely noisy and disruptive table next to us that was ruining our experience, and when asked the staff happily moved us to another area of the restaurant. 
Whilst I am happy to give five stars, and would have done this anyway, the waiter came over to us and asked us to complete a review. This was no issue, but he then proceeded to hover over us insisting all three of us did a review while he was there, and before we had finished our drinks. It was slightly annoying and strange to be interrupted in this way, especially when he was checking to make sure what score and review was given. This technique might be something to reconsider in future. Other than that, it was a great evening
reviews.title: Great family evening out
